. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia was no longer fit for the job. This is simply a recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote at the time. While Steve Ballmer was vague about the reasons, analysts believed that the CEO had lost faith in Muglia's ability to lead the company into the next generation of enterprise computing.

Allen Iverson was voted an All-Star starter by the fans, a selection that has drawn criticism. The former NBA MVP and four-time scoring champion plans to play in his 11th straight All-Star game Feb. 14 at Cowboys Stadium. My fans still support me. You can't ask for more than that, he said. "When you play this game, it's all about the people that come to see you, the people in the stands. For somebody to say the fans don't mean anything, that

According to the Morning News, Dwaine Caraway on Tuesday told Dallas sports radio station 1310 AM that he honored Michael Vick because he thinks the quarterback can be a role model for kids. These kids are the future, and we don't have enough folks out here joining hands and turning lives around, Dwaine Caraway said, according to the newspaper. Since his release from prison in 2009, Michael Vick has voluntarily spoken to kids about how dogfighting is wrong, among other things. An online

"Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making," he said. For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Eric Schmidt - formerly CEO of Novell and CTO at Sun Microsystems, had quit his position on the board of Apple in 2009 due to a growing conflict of interest with his role at Google. Haymarket Media. NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said. "He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations." Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.
